client_profile_secondary_school_name: Istituto Tecnico Agrario Statale Francesco De Sanctis Foggia
client_description_Summary_Note:
Ferrari Rizzo Celli and the RM were introduced at an art auction in Rome. They bonded over their appreciation for contemporary art and exchanged contact information to discuss potential collaborations.
Ferrari Rizzo Celli is a 23 year old and comes from Italy.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Ferrari Rizzo Celli is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2020, Ferrari graduated from Istituto Tecnico Agrario Statale Francesco De Sanctis Foggia with a secondary school diploma.
Ferrari completed his university education at University of Turin in 2025.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Ferrari Rizzo Celli is a 23 year old and comes from Italy.
Ferrari Rizzo Celli did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.In 2019, he received an inheritance of 1110000 EUR from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Neurosurgeon, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is excited to help Ferrari navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
